alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 1:01PM PST until December 28 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * CHANGES... Shortened the end time to 4 AM Wednesday. * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, except up 4 to 12 inches above 7000 feet. Waves 3 to 5 feet on Lake Tahoe. Winds gusting to 45 mph except up to 100 mph along ridge tops. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. Winds and waves may capsize boats on Lake Tahoe.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. Avoid boating activities until winds and waves subside. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
